title: [中英對照]中學生致全港市民的公開信(中學生連署)

replies.msg:
致香港特別行政區政府、全港市民：

我們是一群來自不同背景、不同學校的本地中學學生，我們沒有組織、更沒有大台，只因警方於近兩個月的反對《逃犯條例》修訂活動期間，對抗爭者採取了過度及不必要的暴力，此等行為均令我們感到十分憤怒。

儘管我們只是一群未成年的中學生，但仍希望盡全力發出最大的聲音，因為我們有著一股傻勁，亦因為這股傻勁，令我們會有衝動的時候，但全因為我們對未來抱有無限的理想，更願意為理想而付出。

因此我們在此再次重申民間的五大訴求:

(1) 全面撤回逃犯修訂條例

(2) 全面收回暴動定性

(3) 全面撤銷被捕抗爭者控罪

(4) 成立獨立調查委員會，徹底追究警方濫權情況

(5) 立即實行雙普選

若有任何一項訴求不獲回應，我們必定不撤不散!

雖然現在正值暑假，而我們作為未成年的中學生，面對香港目前狀況及未來仍會感到相當憂慮，但我們仍然會盡自己的能力去作出抗爭，希望更多中學生可以加入我們聯署的行列，以我們的能力全力奮鬥，為着一個更美好、民主的香港而去努力。

中學生聯線

我哋嘅ig(歡迎大家follow): st_connecthk

To HKSAR government, fellow Hong Kong citizens,

We are a group of local students from different secondary schools and backgrounds. We are not a formal organisation and do not have any backing. We are only coming forward to express our anger towards the use of excessive force by the HKPF over the past two months in its handling of the anti-extradition protest.

Although we have not yet reached the age of majority,  our guilelessness is what gives us the faith that our voice could be heard.  We have faith for our future, and are willing to work towards this future.

Therefore, we hereby re-state the five core demands

(1) Withdrawal of the Extradition Bill in its entirety.

(2) Retraction of the “riot” mischaracterization of the 12 June protest.

(3) Immediate release of exoneration of all protestors.

(4) Establishment of an Independent Commission of Inquiry.

(5) Free and fair elections through Dual Universal Suffrage.

We will not rest until all of the 5 demands are met.

It is our our summer break at this time. However, in light of the current situation, we share our fellow citizens’ concern for the current crisis and Hong Kong’s future. We wish to do our part in the movement, and hope that more of our fellow students will join us in the effort.

Our common aim is to build a better, democratic Hong Kong.

Students Connect
